Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Mist Wurm" targets 1, 2, or 3 cards your opponent controls.\n2. If you use a monster with a mandatory Trigger Effect like "Goblin Zombie" as a Synchro Material Monster for "Mist Wurm" you will activate both the effect of "Goblin Zombie" and the effect of "Mist Wurm" after the Synchro Summon is successful.

PSCT.Edison:
1 Tuner + 2 or more non-Tuners
① If Synchro Summoned: Target up to 3 cards your opponent controls (min. 1); return them to the hand.
